items.value:
So before we continue our Business.
I have 5x Bong with me that i need to sell.

You will need them in time! (Michael's Jobs)
If you buy them right now we can continue our Green Business!

Price: 10x Ganja
i take them and will give you 10x Ganja
Wait.. i dont have Ganja with me!

Why? Hmmm .. good Question!
Just buy it, you ask far too much. :o)

Michael will definitely take it from you.
You will find Michael at the Center!
i see! Where did we stop?
ok but i need to go..

I love to inspect the harvest of others.
Yours is especially beautiful!

You get:
5x Bong

Come back if you want to sell something.
Have a nice day!

Unfortunately you have nothing suitable with you!
Come back if you have smelly Ganja :o)

Take care o7
